title: JMI Recruitment 2026 - Apply for Project Assistant Posts
description: Jamia Millia Islamia (JMI) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified for the B.Sc, B.E/ B.Tech, Diploma in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the JMI Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of appli...
